DOC.brief_summary: Observational study on ReCap/Magnum in Total Hip Replacement and Resurfacing.
DOC.brief_title: Data Collection on ReCap/Magnum in Total Hip Replacement and Resurfacing
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study intends to collect efficacy and safety data on ReCap/Magnum in Total Hip Replacement and Resurfacing.
DOC.criteria: Consecutive series of patients received Total Hip Replacement or Resurfacing with ReCap/Magnum for Its Respective Indications for Use/Intended Uses
